speaker: doctor
text: Let me ask you about your tobacco use. Are you a current smoker?

speaker: patient
text: Yes, I smoke cigarettes every day, about a pack a day.

speaker: doctor
text: So you're a current every day tobacco user. Do you use any other tobacco products besides cigarettes?

speaker: doctor
text: How long have you been smoking?

speaker: patient
text: I've been smoking for about 20 years.
